title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 to launch in August, may add a skin thermometer to the Wear OS watch
content:
The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 is one the best smartwatches you can buy today, in part because of its excellent health and fitness tracking tools. According to a new report, the Galaxy Watch 5 will add a skin thermometer to the package.

moreâ€¦

The post Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 to launch in August, may add a skin thermometer to the Wear OS watch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: To help you keep track of a fever or other conditions, Samsung is reportedly putting a thermometer in its upcoming Galaxy Watch 5.
